runs.comm: good length outside off stump, played from the crease on the off side
Shehzad's away, and how! Striding forward to a half-volley outside off and driving it fluently through covers
defended on the back foot on the off side, Sammy had dragged his length back a touch
short of a length and Shehzad drags it from outside off stump, pulling to deep midwicket

edged and dropped by the keeper standing up to the stumps! Hafeez prodded off the back foot at a good length ball outside off, it was a thick edge so a tough chance. But edges off the seamers will be tough to catch if you're standing up to the stumps
defended on the back foot
gets on to the front foot and blocks
a full toss, which Hafeez sweeps through square leg, Barnwell covers good ground running to his right from deep midwicket and dives to save a boundary
bowled full and straight, defended from the crease on the off side
defended on the front foot on the off side
goes right back and cuts the ball from off stump to point
driven to mid-off for a single
short of a length on middle and leg, swatted off the back foot to short fine leg and the non-striker initiates the single and sprints through, beating the throw to the keeper
played off the back foot to third man

what happened there? Shehzad shaped to cut and then the ball came back into him after pitching just outside off, he was cramped for room and just stopped his shot, allowing the ball to hit the bat. That could have gone anywhere but it lobbed safely short of point
defended on the off side
too short and Shehzad is quick to go back and pull the ball over midwicket for the innings' second boundary
steered off the back foot to third man
a full ball on a wicket to wicket line, driven from the crease to mid-off
pushed to mid-off for another single, Narine is not the quickest at mid-off
played off the back foot on the leg side
a mis-timed chip falls well short of the fielder at long on
poor delivery, a leg-stump full toss, the batsman came out and clipped the ball off his pads into the gap on the deep midwicket boundary

caught at short third man! Badree bowled a tight length on off stump, Hafeez went back to cut but ended up getting more of a top edge straight to Simmons. He was caught in that position in the first game too
good length on middle stump, Shehzad stays in his crease and defends to the bowler
defended on the front foot to cover
a fuller ball on off stump, driven from the crease to mid-off
short of a length on the pads, Amin jumps back and clips the ball off his thigh through backward square leg, Narine gave chase from short fine leg but he was never going to reach that
played off the back foot towards point
played from the crease towards midwicket
defended on the front foot
Shehzad gets down on one knee and paddles to short fine leg, Amin sprints through for a quick single, taking on Best's throw and making it despite a direct hit
the offbreak on middle and leg, pushed to cover
nimble footwork on the straight boundary from Pollard! Amin gave Narine the charge and lofted the ball high down the ground. Pollard ran to his left from long off and tapped the ball in with his boot
short and wide outside off stump, Shehzad cuts off the back foot and the fielder at point saves the boundary by taking pace off the ball as he dived to his right

that's so deft! Shehzad went on the front foot and then waited for the short offbreak to arrive around off stump and then just dinked it past the keeper to the third man boundary, he placed that so fine

caught and bowled! Amin mis-timed the straight drive - it's difficult to hit on the up on this pitch - and Sammy reached out with his right hand and took the catch at around waist height. A sharp catch, for that was struck quite firmly
Haris scores his first T20I runs by punching through point
defended from the crease towards point
cut from the crease towards point
a full ball around off, Haris drives on the front foot to cover
played from the crease to wicket
Shehzad screamed in disappointment/frustration after he missed the cut, that was a bit too close to off stump
this time he  makes contact, cutting to backward point
tight length on middle stump, defended on the off side
cut off the back foot to point once again
swept to deep backward square leg for a single

a splendid caught and bowled! Haris gave the bowler the charge and lofted down the ground, he did not time it well though and ended up miscuing it towards the region between mid-on and mid-off. With both fielders on the boundary, Badree realised he was best placed to go for it and so he turned around in his follow through and ran. He got to the ball as it dropped over his head, reached out both arms at full straight, caught it and tumbled, the ball safely in his grasp
steered off the back foot to third man
worked off the pads on the back foot through square leg
145kph, but pace is of little use when the line is down leg side, Shehzad missed the glance but the ball brushed his pads and raced to the fine leg boundary
length ball outside off, steered from the crease towards third man
a full ball around off stump, Akmal stays in his crease and opens the face of his bat to play to point
he stays balanced in his crease, watching the ball on to the face of the bat and angles it to play towards third man
played back to the bowler
clipped off the pads through square leg for a single
played off the back foot through mid-on for a single
nudged off the pads in front of square for another one
Shehzad tried to pull that but the length wasn't short enough and he mis-timed it on the leg side
played through the leg side for a single
banged in short but the line is down leg side, Shehzad missed the hook and Best is excited after Charles dives to his left and catches the ball, that did not hit the bat or glove
a length ball around off stump, driven from the crease to point
that's a massive hit! Shehzad was on the front foot to the length ball, then transferred weight back and pulled it far over the midwicket boundary
makes room by moving towards leg and plays towards cover
a slower ball but it is down leg side, Shehzad tried to pull but couldn't reach it
Shehzad moves across his stumps to a fullish ball, getting inside the line of the delivery and then flicking it in the air towards the deep backward square leg boundary
a full ball around off stump, dug out towards cover
good length, pitching outside off and angling into the right-hander, played on the off side, towards cover
Shehzad backed away outside leg stump, Bravo fired it full outside off and Shehzad was too far away from the ball to make contact with his drive
chipped in the air through mid-off for a single
the slower ball on off and middle, Akmal gets behind it and defends to the bowler
defended on the off side

Bravo's just taken out the non-striker! He bowled a slower ball which hit the leading edge of Akmal's bat and lobbed towards the bowler, Bravo leaped in the air to his right to try and reach it but could not. As he landed, Bravo made contact with Shehzad as the non-striker was trying to run and brought him to the ground. Shehzad lost his bat as he got up and completed the run. They shook on it after the run was completed
defended on the front foot to the bowler

Pollard goes wide of the crease and pitches on a good length, the batsman uses the angle into him to tap through midwicket, the fielder fires the throw into Charles and the ball bounces off the keeper's pads close on the leg side and the batsman run an overthrow
pushed towards square leg for a quick single
that's gone, all the way over the straight boundary! Shehzad cleared his front foot to create hitting space, and then got under a length ball and hit cleanly through the line
caught on the deep midwicket boundary! Pollard pitched it short, Shehzad met it on the front foot and pulled, but he was slightly cramped for room. He hit it straight to Simmons who judged it well
Akmal stays in his crease and opens the face to play the ball to short third man
short ball, and it doesn't matter if it is his first delivery, Afridi will hook. He mis-times the shot towards long leg
Akmal charges down the pitch and then has to reach out and cut a full ball past point
another short ball and Afridi tries to pull against the wind, he gets a thick inside edge and the ball thuds into his body and rolls on the off side
a full ball outside off, Akmal leans across and nudges through midwicket
a slower ball around off stump, pushed into the covers for a single
moves towards the off against a full ball and flicks off the pads through square leg
short and wide, bowled from wide of the crease, so much width outside off that Akmal has plenty of time to wait and cut wide of Narine at short third man
that's wide down leg side
a fuller ball outside off, Akmal is beaten on the cut and Charles fumbles the take
moves towards the of side and plays it back to the bowler
a full ball from wide of the crease, Afridi drives the ball into the covers
Afridi works the ball off the front foot through midwicket
Akmal leans across towards the off and clips the ball through midwicket
Narine delivers on middle and leg from round the wicket and the batsman works it through midwicket
driven from the crease through cover where Gayle dives over the ball and allows runs
played to short fine leg for a quick single
that's bowled down leg side, Afridi can't connect with the sweep
Afridi moved outside leg stump, exposing all three to Narine as he swung hard and missed

he's hit that into the wind and the ball falls into Samuels' hands on the long leg boundary. Afridi got down low and slog swept the ball, but I think it hit the top edge, the boundary has been pulled in and Samuels took the catch on the edge of the rope
dabbed from the crease towards point for a quick single
Bravo goes round the wicket and bowls full and wide outside off, angling across the right-hander, the ball beats the bat and also beats Charles
Azam walks across his stumps and flicks the ball through midwicket

a misfield from Best at midwicket allows the second, I think he was looking up to see if the batsmen were going for the second before he picked up the ball. Akmal had slogged it from off through midwicket
Akmal comes down the pitch, Bravo bowls a full toss around waist height, and Akmal swivels and pulls it to the backward square leg boundary
Akmal digs out a yorker through midwicket, Bravo chases after it trying to prevent the second but fails
works off the pads towards square leg
reaches forward and paddles the full ball from outside off to short fine leg

stumped by a huge distance! Azam came out of his crease too early, Narine had plenty of time to outwit the batsman and he did so by bowling a shorter, flatter and faster delivery that went away from the right hander. Azam was nowhere near the pitch of the ball and was beaten on the outside edge. Charles had a simple stumping to complete
nudged off the front foot towards point
Tanvir tries the reverse paddle and misses
another one goes! Tanvir tried to swat that behind square leg, the ball pitched on middle and began to spin across the left-hander, it hit the top edge and lobbed to Bravo at short fine leg
short ball outside off stump, Babar cuts and beats backward point off the first ball he faces
moves outside leg stump to a low full toss and tries to drive through point, he gets a thick outside edge towards short third man
Babar top edged a slower ball towards square leg, Bravo ran towards it to try and catch it but did not make it in time, instead he ended up kicking it away and conceding an extra run
Akmal charges the bowler and blasts a full ball fiercely through cover, superb timing and nimble footwork
in the blockhole and the batsman is beaten
a huge hit! Akmal opens up his stance by clearing his front foot and launches a length ball high over the midwicket boundary
played off the back foot towards deep square leg
Babar tried to reverse swat that but missed, he did not know where the ball had gone after it hit his bat and wandered out of his crease, he got back in time
dabbed behind point for a single
Akmal hits the ball hard  to deep midwicket
Babar dabs the doosra to short third man for another single
Akmal clears his front foot but mis-times the slog through midwicket, he wants two but won't get it
pulled off the back foot to deep square leg, and that's the end of the innings
